Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description

docs.text: Type: Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form. docs.text: Class: NamedThing a databased entity or concept/class NOTE : this is an abstract class and should not be instantiated directly URI: nmdc_patterns:NamedThing classDiagram class NamedThing NamedThing <|-- PlannedProcess NamedThing : id Inheritance NamedThing PlannedProcess Slots Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance id 1..1 Uriorcurie A unique identifier for a thing direct Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self nmdc_patterns:NamedThing native nmdc_patterns:NamedThing LinkML Source Direct name: NamedThing description: a databased entity or concept/class from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns abstract: true slots: - id Induced name: NamedThing description: a databased entity or concept/class from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns abstract: true attributes: id: name: id description: A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI notes: - 'abstracted pattern: prefix:typecode-authshoulder-blade(.version)?(_seqsuffix)?' - a minimum length of 3 characters is suggested for typecodes, but 1 or 2 characters will be accepted - typecodes must correspond 1:1 to a class in the NMDC schema. this will be checked via per-class id slot usage assertions - minting authority shoulders should probably be enumerated and checked in the pattern examples: - value: nmdc:mgmag-00-x012.1_7_c1 description: https://github.com/microbiomedata/nmdc-schema/pull/499#discussion_r1018499248 from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns rank: 1000 identifier: true alias: id owner: NamedThing domain_of: - Activity - NamedThing range: uriorcurie required: true pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+:[a-zA-Z0-9_][a-zA-Z0-9_\-\/\.,]*$
docs.title: Class: NamedThing

docs.text: name: PlannedProcess from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns is_a: NamedThing abstract: true attributes: id: name: id description: A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI notes: - 'abstracted pattern: prefix:typecode-authshoulder-blade(.version)?(_seqsuffix)?' - a minimum length of 3 characters is suggested for typecodes, but 1 or 2 characters will be accepted - typecodes must correspond 1:1 to a class in the NMDC schema. this will be checked via per-class id slot usage assertions - minting authority shoulders should probably be enumerated and checked in the pattern examples: - value: nmdc:mgmag-00-x012.1_7_c1 description: https://github.com/microbiomedata/nmdc-schema/pull/499#discussion_r1018499248 from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns rank: 1000 identifier: true alias: id owner: PlannedProcess domain_of: - Activity - NamedThing range: uriorcurie required: true pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+:[a-zA-Z0-9_][a-zA-Z0-9_\-\/\.,]*$ class_uri: OBI:0000011

docs.text: Type: Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path. docs.text: Slot: id A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI URI: nmdc_patterns:id Applicable Classes Name Description Modifies Slot OmicsProcessing yes Activity Something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; i... yes WorkflowExecutionActivity yes NamedThing a databased entity or concept/class no PlannedProcess no Properties Range: Uriorcurie Required: True Regex pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+:[a-zA-Z0-9_][a-zA-Z0-9_\-\/\.,]*$ Examples Value nmdc:mgmag-00-x012.1_7_c1 Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns LinkML Source name: id description: A unique identifier for a thing. Must be either a CURIE shorthand for a URI or a complete URI notes: - 'abstracted pattern: prefix:typecode-authshoulder-blade(.version)?(_seqsuffix)?' - a minimum length of 3 characters is suggested for typecodes, but 1 or 2 characters will be accepted - typecodes must correspond 1:1 to a class in the NMDC schema. this will be checked via per-class id slot usage assertions - minting authority shoulders should probably be enumerated and checked in the pattern examples: - value: nmdc:mgmag-00-x012.1_7_c1 description: https://github.com/microbiomedata/nmdc-schema/pull/499#discussion_r1018499248 from_schema: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/nmdc-patterns rank: 1000 identifier: true alias: id domain_of: - Activity - NamedThing range: uriorcurie required: true pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+:[a-zA-Z0-9_][a-zA-Z0-9_\-\/\.,]*$
docs.title: Slot: id
